Blog.post: Anyone wanna do anything...i need to get out of here its driving me insane 2 watch the daysz go by again and again like this. I just feel like shit right now, dunno y. Anyways whos goin to the anime expo?

[sigh] i rather be doing sumthing better den sitting here..listening to music and thinking how my life got dis way. I dont know y games seem just too boring...or mayb theres jsut sumthing on my mind. I wonder whats next in life...if i live til then

Just transferred alot of stuff from my other comp to my faster one. Also if ur wondering y im not aim alot of the time, its just that dont feel like talking so if anyone thinks im trying to avoid dem im probably not...
Finally setting up my gaming computer that i got in november. o ya kien im borrowing ur banner until i make one.

Well one of my sis went to a condo with friendz, other sis iono is never home, younger is out, brother warcraft addict, parents r at work, me siting here cuz im not busy for the 2nd day in dis week, o wellz im b ocupied all next week.
Well looks liek imma b busy 2morrow again
dayz go by alot faster wen u r ocuppied
Recently I've been busy...at least it keeps me from dinkin too much like sum ppl say i do
just look ay my xangas to lazy 2 type here
hmmm gonna get more new stuff for my room
nuthing unusual just been thinkin, my headache is kind a coming back, maybe its from thinking too much..who knoes
that sums up everything look at xanga for more information.........

well looks like im not goin on vacation this month, cuz i start drivers ed at the middle of it. Anyways i wont be on aim much so call my cell o house # is u need me o jus wanna talk, if i dont pick up it means i dont wanna talk 2 u most likely o im not there at the moment.

look at my xanga ...tooo lazy 2 type... well imma type a little...i have a real bad headache right now..iono y..mayb i slept 2 long, listened to too music classical music while sleeping, or its something else. And i dink sum1 is tryin 2 make me horny...i was redirected to porn links when i was searching for tags.
